name: Rent a Car

examples.text: I want to create new code for my credit card
Where can I find information about changing my card pin?
I need to talk to customer service, but I've lost my password. can you help me?

I don't remember my debit card pin. how do I recover it?

Let's try to say that again more clearly, shall we?
I don't understand what you're saying
I didn't quite understand what you said
I did not quite understand what you gave me
Can you say that again please?

I d like to stop doing this
It was nice chatting with you
We will need to begin again
One more time from the beginning
Let's pick this up from the top again.
Let's go back to square one
I would like to start all over
I want start from the beginning
Are you still here with me?
Did you hear what I said?
Speak to me if you are there.

intents.description: Ask the bot to indicate that it is available.

examples.text: Can you tell me a joke?
What do you do for fun?

intents.description: Ask the bot to take one step back.

examples.text: That is precisely what I was looking for
Affirmative. That's what I'm looking for.

intents.description: Acknowledge that the response satisfies a question.

examples.text: Do you know who you are?

examples.text: Tell me, are you a human or no?

examples.text: Can I connect to an agent?

Yes, take me to a real person
I do not think it is the answer?
It is not what I want
It is not what I was looking for
That sounds like the wrong response
You did not understand what I asked
You did not understand what I said

examples.text: How do I know if my card info is kept safe?

In what way can I tell if my plastic is safe?
I'd like proof of a secure chat
How is my credit card info secured?
How do I know this chat is not a scam?
Do you have protection against hacks?

Why would I trust this chat?
What safety measures are used to ensure that chat is secure?
What guards do you have in place to protect your customer's data?

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

examples.text: I would like to add an authorized user to my account.

description: A demo chat to request a rental car

output.text: OK, $name. Please confirm. You want a $color $car_type car on $date at $time. Right?
What day would you like to pickup your car, $name?
Hello. This is Watson. What's  your name?
What type of car do you want?
What time on <? $date.reformatDateTime("EEEEE") ?> do you want to pickup your car?

values: Unfortunately, $name, I don't really have any cars. This is a demo chat.
